B

bigShitt(boolean) - Static method in class mainpackage.UnsuitedMeths
This method iterates on all 6-cards combinations, finds the resulting choice of discard for all of them and sums it all to produce arrays containing statistics about the likehood of every pair of cards to put in the crib.
bigShitt(float[][], boolean, int) - Static method in class mainpackage.UnsuitedMeths
This method iterates on all 6-cards combinations, finds the resulting choice of discard for all of them and sums it all to produce arrays containing statistics about the likehood of every pair of cards to put in the crib.It produces both suited and unsuited stats (write in files) and return the unsuited array
boolIter(boolean[]) - Static method in class mainpackage.CombMeths
After calling 2^tab.length times, iterates on all 2^tab.length possible boolean array of length tab.length
